key_talking_points: Carter Verhaeghe of the Florida Panthers missed a shot wide-right at 18:54 remaining in the first period. Followed shortly after by a shot on goal from Gustav Forsling at 18:48. The score is 5-4 in favor of Florida.
A faceoff win by the Edmonton Oilers in the neutral zone after a puck-in-benches stoppage. The Oilers are attempting to close the one-goal deficit early in the game.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game has a close score, warranting attention. Focus on chances and attempts to tie the game.

task_details.specific_guidance: Monitor shot attempts and faceoff wins, providing context to the commentary team
